name: Cryptid Hunter (SurrealGaming, jrperez525, rr696, moo, PunkGameDev)
name_original: Cryptid Hunter (SurrealGaming, jrperez525, rr696, moo, PunkGameDev)
description:
• Prove the existence of cryptids with your trusty camera! Track them in their natural habitats and get close enough for the perfect angle. Exploit your surroundings for stealth, but don’t let them get in the way of your target. Use care not to disturb your subject. Some cryptids are easily frightened, and others you should fear!

    Controls:
  • WASD: Walk and strafe.
  • Mouse Movement: Look Direction
  • Q: Toggle Camera on/off
  • Left click: Take Picture (while camera is on).

Unity Assets Used

Rewired
Advanced-Multi-Scene: Cross Scene References!
Odin - Inspector and Serializer
